note.p: Daughter of Sarah and Charles Hall, barrister. Married Edmund John Mortlock in St James’s, Paddington, in 1859.
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813-1917 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 5 December 2019)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 5 December 2019)
